title: Strategies for Improving EFL Learner Satisfaction in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher English communication skills and foundational math concepts
context.additional_context: English-based mathematics content delivery for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, integrating online-offline classes using digital devices (laptops/tablets).

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three criteria for evaluating the quality of information in an LMS within a blended learning environment.
Learners achieve over 80% participation in online discussion activities utilizing Teaching Presence.
Learners present case studies applying Cognitive Presence in the process of solving real-world problems through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
